channel.title: Comments on: Farmers and Botters and Gnomes

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description: The botter's story thread hasn't gotten deleted. It has, in fact, hit the 500 post limit. There's some entertaining reading in there, I think, for those of you who haven't looked at it... might want to do so before it falls away.
item.content:encoded: The botter’s story thread hasn’t gotten deleted. It has, in fact, hit the 500 post limit. There’s some entertaining reading in there, I think, for those of you who haven’t looked at it… might want to do so before it falls away.

item.title: By: ghiest
item.dc:creator: ghiest
item.description:
ShowEQ became the norm in high end guilds even before I left the game (around the Planes of power expansion i think ... but I hated SoL as well).
There were equal programs for both DaoC and rumored to exist for WoW, but with instancing that type of program is pretty useless in wow.
item.content:encoded:
ShowEQ became the norm in high end guilds even before I left the game (around the Planes of power expansion i think … but I hated SoL as well).

There were equal programs for both DaoC and rumored to exist for WoW, but with instancing that type of program is pretty useless in wow.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Good get, Ramada!
A client-side hack you say? No fucking shit.
<a href="http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1192/734497253_1a5a596a17_o.jpg" rel="nofollow">Screenie of dead gnomes</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Good get, Ramada!

A client-side hack you say? No fucking shit.

Screenie of dead gnomes.

item.title: By: Ramada
item.dc:creator: Ramada
item.description:
For the curious, Kotaku has an image of this "phenomenon": http://kotaku.com/gaming/rain-o.er-me/gnomes-rain-down-upon-azeroth-die-for-advertising-275294.php
And woohoo for Skywall! Too bad I moved over to the Horde side.
item.content:encoded:
For the curious, Kotaku has an image of this “phenomenon”:
http://kotaku.com/gaming/rain-o.er-me/gnomes-rain-down-upon-azeroth-die-for-advertising-275294.php

And woohoo for Skywall! Too bad I moved over to the Horde side.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
Huh. That's what I get for not logging in to WoW so much lately. I miss all the fun!
Gnomes falling from the sky. Now that's clever marketing.
item.content:encoded:
Huh. That’s what I get for not logging in to WoW so much lately. I miss all the fun!

Gnomes falling from the sky. Now that’s clever marketing.

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description: ShowEQ. Man, I always wanted that program. It sounded so damn COOL.
item.content:encoded: ShowEQ. Man, I always wanted that program. It sounded so damn COOL.
